cause.description:
1. St. Jude Children’s Research Hospital is the only pediatric cancer research center that pays for all treatment not covered by insurance, regardless of
2. St. Jude pays for costs of travel, food and lodging for every patient and a parent.
3. Scientific discoveries made at St. Jude lead to life-saving cures and treatments around the world.
cause.mission: Give thanks for the healthy children in your life, give to those who are not.
cause.name: St. Jude Children's Research Hospital
